DeepSpiringMod:BlockStrike.NAME: BlockStrike
DeepSpiringMod:BlockStrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Retain your hand this turn.

DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.NAME: Stochastic Process
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, play 1 card in your discard pile randomly.
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, play !M! cards in your discard pile randomly.

DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.NAME: Overflow
DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust .

DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.NAME: Attention Head
DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.DESCRIPTION: When triggering deepspikingmod:forward_propagation and this card is in the discard pile, play the next 1 card.
DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When triggering deepspikingmod:forward_propagation and this card is in the discard pile, play the next 2 cards.

DeepSpiringMod:ForwardPropagation.NAME: Forward Propagation
DeepSpiringMod:ForwardPropagation.DESCRIPTION: Activate all *Attention *Head and *Convolution *Kernel 's effects in discard pile.
